data.title: David Dhawan Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about David Dhawan with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Took up acting in college, but soon realised that film-making is his forte

Started his career by editing news for Bombay TV and moved on to editing films later on; Bollywood actor Sanjay Dutt helped him get his first break as a director

Has often collaborated with the famous Bollywood actor Govinda to make various comedy movies

They first paired up in the film Taaqatwar (1989)

Honoured with an Academy Award by Asian Academy of Film & Television in 2009

Appeared as a judge for the third season of the reality dance competition Nach Baliye
